tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  precipitation FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT,
  weather_condition TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE crop_growth_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name TEXT,
  growth_stage TEXT,
  predicted_yield INT,
  growth_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE crop_growth_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50),
    growth_stage VARCHAR(50),
    growth_rate FLOAT,
    date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE weather_crop_mapping (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    weather_id INT,
    crop_id INT,
    relation_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE predictive_analytics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    prediction VARCHAR(100),
    accuracy FLOAT
)
